title: Vault Root Configuration for MBA Hierarchy
details:
CRITICAL FINDING: To ensure MBA is treated as the "main" program level in the hierarchy, the vault root must be set to "D:\source\notebook-automation\test-vault-structure\Projects" rather than "D:\source\notebook-automation\test-vault-structure\Projects\MBA".

With vault root = "Projects":
- MBA becomes depth level 1 (program level)
- Digital Program, Value Program, XYZ Program become depth level 2 (course level)
- Operations, Finance, Marketing become depth level 3 (class level)
- Individual modules become depth level 4 (module level)

This is the correct hierarchy structure based on the business logic requirements.

Command used: dotnet run --project src/c-sharp/NotebookAutomation.Cli -- vault ensure-metadata "D:\source\notebook-automation\test-vault-structure\Projects" --override-vault-root "D:\source\notebook-automation\test-vault-structure\Projects" --verbose

Debug output confirmed correct hierarchy detection:
- DEBUG: FindHierarchyInfo - relativePath: 'MBA\Digital Program\Finance\Finance.md'
- DEBUG: Updating hierarchy metadata 'program' from 'Digital Program' to 'MBA' (templateType=program)
